title: Lake Mead National Recreation Area: Teacher Workshops
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Professional Development     Teacher Workshops                Teacher Workshops         Teachers learning about the desert tortoise.   National Education Portal National Park Service education resources (from parks and sites around the country) brought together on nps.gov for use by teachers.   Teacher Workshops We are expanding our education outreach through teacher workshops. The purpose of these workshops is to build partnerships with teachers, so they better understand the resources available to them and how to use the park as an outdoor classroom; e-mail us if you are interested in being put on a contact list for future teacher workshops.
